About Me

Let me tell you a few things........

BIO

I am a highly motivated individual that always want to give a quality services to any organisation. I enjoy working in challenging and stimulating environment and I always welcome opportunities to develop and apply new and existing skills. Working with others is something I highly relish, due to the many positives of this, including building working relationships and sharing workload. My ‘can-do’ approach as a team player has enhanced my delivery within a customer-focused business environment using my proactive nature, as well as my ability to use my own initiative. I am eager to progress my career in a dynamic environment where I can effectively learn new skills to support organisational growth and performance.

Carlisle Support Services

Project Coordinator

As a Project Coordinator I assist the project manager by tracking and dispensing all of the information the various team member need to do their job effectively. Furthermore I am expected to organize the people and resources of a project to ensure that it runs smoothly and is completed. Moreover I also complete a variety of different tasks, many of which will vary on a day- to -day basis.

F4mao Limited

Assistance Cable installer

As a Cable installer my roles involves running in data/fiber cable from one data hall to another, also carrying out cable matt, copex, dressing, trunking and labelling data cable. I also helps in installing and terminating cat 5, cat 6 data cable in patch panel. I am used to working unsupervised and completing job to a high standard. I have install Cisco Access point for Apple stores.

Coding Bootcamp

Front-End-Developer

This is where i learnt how to use HTML5 to design and create a well structured online content compactible with Web best practices. I also build upon my HTML5 skills to go from CSS3 basics to advanced techniques and create a beautiful and a responsive web Apps. I also know more about Javascript which Breathes more life into my Web Apps.
